meta.name: QIF Derivation Timeline
meta.description: Curated milestones from the QIF Derivation Log. Powers the dynamic timeline on qinnovate.com. Add new entries as breakthroughs occur — the timeline renders automatically.

milestones.title: First Commit
milestones.description: First commit to the QIF repository. Zero techniques. Zero framework. Just the question: what does a security model look like when the endpoint is a human brain?

milestones.title: OSI Rejected
milestones.description: The legacy 14-layer model based on the OSI stack was recognized as meaningless for BCI. A brain is not a network. Framework redesign initiated.

milestones.title: Hourglass Conceived
milestones.description: Circular topology evolved into the hourglass geometry. Silicon bands above, neural bands below, pinching at the electrode-tissue interface (I0). The shape that defines QIF.

milestones.title: v3.1 Validated
milestones.description: 7-band symmetric hourglass (3 silicon, I0 interface, 3 neural) validated by 3 independent research agents against 102 sources. The architecture that holds.

milestones.title: Hamiltonian Root
milestones.description: The QI equation was grounded in Hamiltonian formalism. Not a heuristic score but a quantity derived from the system's energy landscape. The unifying mathematical root.

milestones.title: NSP Formalized
milestones.description: Neural Sensory Protocol designed as a 6-layer validation stack. Physics-based authentication using spectral invariants, microstate compliance, and challenge-response. Biological TLS.

milestones.title: L=v/f Unification
milestones.description: The relationship between neural oscillation frequency and spatial extent unified into a single equation. Five coupling mechanisms identified (electromagnetic, acoustic, optical, thermal, mechanical).

milestones.title: Post-Quantum Crypto
milestones.description: Neural data has a decades-long sensitivity window. Harvest-now-decrypt-later is a real threat to BCI recordings. ML-KEM and ML-DSA integrated into NSP.

milestones.title: v4.0 Implemented
milestones.description: Full v4.0 hourglass implemented in code: 11 bands, coupling mechanisms, as-code diagram generation. The framework became software, not just a document.

milestones.title: 60 Threats Mapped
milestones.description: Three separate threat inventories merged into one unified taxonomy. 60 techniques across 11 MITRE-compatible tactics spanning 7 domains from silicon to biology.

milestones.title: NISS Created
milestones.description: NISS (Neural Impact Scoring System) created because CVSS cannot account for biological reversibility, cognitive integrity impact, or neural tissue interaction. A severity metric built for brains, not servers.

milestones.title: NISS v1.0 Finalized
milestones.short: Every technique scored for neural impact
milestones.description: NISS v1.0 scoring methodology finalized. Spectral decomposition bridge connects raw neural signals to per-band QI scoring. Every technique now carries severity calibrated to neural, not just digital, impact.

milestones.title: Phase Dynamics Discovered
milestones.description: Dynamical systems theory applied to BCI security. Six new attack classes discovered: separatrix exploitation, bifurcation forcing, adiabatic drift, phase replay, integrator/resonator switching, baseline poisoning. Biological TLS concept born.

milestones.title: DSM Dissolved into NSP
milestones.description: Dynamical systems monitoring folded into NSP layers L3-L5 instead of creating a parallel system. Design principle: deepen existing components, do not add new ones.

milestones.title: NSP Enables Medicine
milestones.description: NSP reframed: not a brake on research but the built-in protection protocol that enables therapeutic BCI deployment. Without it, no regulator approves consumer neural stimulation devices. Security is not the obstacle. It is the enabler.

milestones.title: Dual-Use Gap Analysis
milestones.description: Systematic audit of all 71 techniques. 35-40 have published therapeutic counterparts. 10 ambiguous. 18-20 pure silicon with no therapeutic analog. The dual-use principle: same physics, different intent. The gap is the research agenda.

milestones.title: TARA Named
milestones.short: Therapeutic Atlas of Risks and Applications
milestones.description: The threat registry became TARA: Therapeutic Atlas of Risks and Applications. Mechanism-first Rosetta Stone architecture with four projections (security, clinical, diagnostic, governance). Named after the Buddhist bodhisattva of compassion and protection.

milestones.title: Framework Complete (v1)
milestones.description: First complete version of the full stack: QIF (framework), NSP (protocol), NISS (scoring), TARA (atlas). 50 derivation log entries. 7 days of formal derivation. 4 framework versions. Ready for independent peer review.

aha.label: Aha Moment
aha.description: Insight or breakthrough that changed the framework's direction
